short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logging into a x.com account using a token

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the plugin's pop-up window, simply enter the token, click "Login," and the page will automatically refresh, enabling one-click login.

----
Update 1.0.2
- Fix a bug where the Login button doesn't work

Update 1.0.1
- Set an expiration time for the auth_token cookie
